column2: Robinson suffered a non-contact torn ACL in his left knee and is on the injured reserve list.
Rivera has landed on injured reserve due to a wrist injury.
Greene Sr. is on the injured reserve list with an unknown ailment.
Benn has been placed on injured reserve with a knee injury.
Overton has landed on the injured reserve list with a shoulder injury.
Ramsey was confined to a limited role in practice due to an injured Achilles but is expected to suit up for the AFC divisional round against the Steelers.
Colvin is ailing from an illness but will likely be available against the Steelers in the AFC divisional round.
Smith is expected to suit up for the AFC divisional round against the Steelers despite battling an ankle injury.
Posluszny is dealing with a abdominal injury but will likely participate in the AFC divisional round against the Steelers.
Lewis has an ankle injury but is expected to play against the Steelers in the AFC divisional round.
Jones is tending to an ankle injury but is likely to participate in the AFC divisional round against the Steelers.
Bohanon has a knee injury but is expected to play against the Steelers in the AFC divisional round.
Brown is nursing an ankle injury and it is undetermined if he will suit up for the AFC divisional round against the Steelers.
Mickens is hampered by a hamstring injury and his availability for the AFC divisional round against the Steelers is up in the air.
Yeldon has come down with an illness but is likely to suit up for the AFC divisional round against the Steelers.
Reed is receiving treatment for a knee injury and it is unknown if he will play against the Steelers in the AFC divisional round.
Strong has been placed on the injured reserve list with a torn ACL.
Cook has been designated for the injured reserve list due to a torn left ACL.

Floyd has landed on the Injured Reserve/Non-Football Injury list as he is recuperating from meniscus surgery. Team officials are concerned that it could be career-threatening as he is experiencing complications in his recovery.
Bradford has been activated from the IR/Designated for Return list after recovering from a left knee scope but it t is unknown if he will play in the NFC divisional round against the Saints.
Stephen injured his ankle but will likely play against the Saints in the NFC divisional round.
Griffen was confined to a limited role in practice due to a foot injury but is expected to suit up for the NFC divisional round against the Saints.
Brock is recovering from a foot injury but is expected to suit up against the Saints in the NFC divisional round.
Newman has an injured foot, leaving his status for the NFC divisional round against the Saints in question.
Ham has a neck injury but is likely to be available for the NFC divisional round against the Saints.
Rudolph is likely to take part in the NFC divisional round against the Saints despite a sprained ankle.
Elflein will likely be available for the NFC divisional round against the Saints despite a shoulder injury.
McDermott has been placed on the injured reserve list with a dislocated shoulder, ending his season.
Easton fractured his ankle and has been placed on injured reserve as a result.
Bell has a shoulder injury and is on the injured reserve list.
Sankey has been placed on the injured reserve list with a knee injury.
Anzalone suffered a right shoulder injury and is on the injured reserve list.
Stupar has been placed on the injured reserve list due to a torn ACL.
Strief has been placed on the injured reserve list with a right knee injury.
Okafor is on the injured reserve list after suffering a torn Achilles.
Lasco suffered a bulging disc and is on the injured reserve list.
Breaux is on the injured reserve list with a fractured fibula in his left leg.
Fairley has been placed on the Injured Reserve/Non-Football Illness list due to a heart condition.
Arnold is on the injured reserve list with an unspecified ailment.
Hill has come down with an illness and his status is uncertain for the NFC divisional round against the Vikings.
Rankins is bothered by an ankle injury but is expected to line up against the Vikings in the NFC divisional round.
Armstead is expected to play in the NFC divisional round against the Vikings despite dealing with an injured thigh.
Hoomanawanui is battling a back injury but will likely be available against the Vikings in the NFC divisional round.
Hendrickson is nursing an ankle injury but is expected to play against the Vikings in the NFC divisional round.
Williams is expected to play in the NFC divisional round against the Vikings despite an ankle injury.
Coleman has a neck injury and will not suit up against the Vikings in the NFC divisional round.
Mauti has come down with an illness and his availability for the NFC divisional round against the Vikings is hazy.
Jordan was confined to a limited role in practice due to a knee injury but is expected to be available for the NFC divisional round against the Vikings.
Onyemata is tending to a thumb injury but is likely to participate in the NFC divisional round against the Vikings.
Peat is on injured reserve due to a broken left fibula and high-ankle sprain.
McDaniel has been designated for the injured reserve list due to a left leg injury.
Kuhn is on the injured reserve list with a torn biceps and it is unclear if he will be activated in time for the NFC divisional round against the Vikings.
Griffin has been placed on injured reserve due to a foot injury.
Dorenbos underwent heart surgery to repair an aortic aneurysm and is on the Injured Reserve/Non-Football Injury list.
Kikaha has been placed on the injured reserve list with an ankle injury, ending his season.
Hughes has been placed on the injured reserve with a torn biceps.
Vaccaro hurt his wrist and has been placed on the injured reserve list.
Klein has landed on injured reserve due to a groin injury.
Parry is on injured reserve with an ankle injury and has also been suspended four games following an off-field incident.
Loewen sustained an ankle injury and is on the injured reserve list.
Fleener has been placed on injured reserve with a concussion.
Harbor is on injured reserve with an unspecified injury.
Jones suffered a torn ACL in his right knee and is on injured reserve as a result.
Eldeman tore the ACL in his right knee and is on the injured reserve list.
Davis has been designated for injured reserve as he is recovering from a bulging disc in his neck.
Langi has been placed on the IR/Non-Football Injury list due to a back injury.
Jelks has landed on the Injured Reserve/Non-Football Injury list due to a knee injury.
Ebner has landed on injured reserve due to a knee injury.
Bennett has been placed on the injured reserve list with a torn rotator cuff and a hamstring injury.
McClellin has been placed on the IR/Designated for Return list with a concussion and is expected to miss the remainder of the season.
Hightower suffered a torn pectoral muscle and is on the injured reserve list.
Branch has been sidelined with a knee injury and it is unclear if he will return for the AFC championship round.
Valentine has landed on the injured reserve list with a knee injury and it is unclear if he will be activated prior to the AFC championship round.
Mitchell is on the injured reserve list with a knee injury and it is unclear when he will be activated for the AFC championship round.
Gillislee has a knee injury and it is uncertain if he will play in the AFC championship round.
Burkhead sustained a left knee sprain and it is unclear if he will return for the AFC championship round.
Cannon has been placed on the injured reserve list with an ankle injury.
Garcia has landed on the Injured Reserve/Non-Football Illness list with an unspecified illness.
Rivers is on injured reserve after suffering a torn ACL in his left knee.
Sproles has been designated for the injured reserve list due to a torn ACL and a broken arm.
Pumphrey is on the injured reserve list with a torn hamstring.
Hicks tore his right Achilles and is on injured reserve.
Peters tore the ACL and MCL in his right knee and is on the injured reserve list.
Shittu has been placed on the injured reserve list due to a knee injury.
Williams has been designated for injured reserve with an Achilles injury.
Jones is battling a hamstring injury and it is unclear if he will be available for the NFC championship round.
Wentz suffered a torn ACL in his left knee and is on the injured reserve list.
Sturgis has landed on the injured reserve list with a strained quadriceps in his plant leg and is not expected to be activated at any point during the remainder of the season.
Maragos has landed on injured reserve with a knee injury.
Walker has been placed on the injured reserve list for undisclosed reasons.
Goforth has landed on injured reserve with a torn ACL.
Finney has a thigh injury but is likely to suit up for the AFC divisional round against the Jaguars.
Hargrave is nursing a back injury but is expected to be available against the Jaguars in the AFC divisional round.
Brown is recovering from a partially torn left calf muscle and an illness but is expected to return for the AFC divisional round against the Jaguars.
Tuitt is expected to take part in the AFC divisional round against the Jaguars despite dealing with an elbow injury.
Burns hyperextended his knee but is expected to suit up for the AFC divisional round against the Jaguars.
Sensabaugh is dealing with a shoulder injury and it is unknown if he will play against the Jaguars in the AFC divisional round.
Shazier had spinal stabilization surgery and is on the injured reserve list.
Conner will need surgery to repair a right knee sprain and is on injured reserve.
Adams has a shoulder injury and is on the injured reserve list.
